question: What is Authentication?
answers: The process of verification of the identity of users to provide access to the system
The method of granting an authenticated party permission to access resources of the system
correctAnswer: The process of verification of the identity of users to provide access to the system

answers: The process of verification of the identity of users to provide access to the system

correctAnswer: The method of granting an authenticated party permission to access resources of the system
